snippet: Adm. Harry B. Harris Jr., who leads the United States Pacific Command, makes no apologies for accusing the Chinese of militarizing disputed waters.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Adm Harry B Harris Jr, American commander in charge of miltary operations in Asia-Pacific region who has rattled both China and Washington with his stark denunciation of China's activities in South China Sea.
lead_paragraph: Adm. Harry B. Harris Jr., who leads the United States Pacific Command, makes no apologies for accusing the Chinese of militarizing disputed waters.

headline.print_headline: A U.S. Admiral’s Bluntness Rattles China, and Washington
headline.main: A U.S. Admiral’s Bluntness Rattles China, and Washington
